title: Bloomfield Bridge
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
John Kane [1860-1934], until 1934; Valentine Gallery, New York, NY; Maynard Walker Galleries, New York, NY; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1954 until October 1, 1981; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1981.

Updated and under review by CGK.

creator.birth_place: West Calder (West Lothian, Scotland, United Kingdom)
